1.title: Rick's Big Bang Theory

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Rick, Marty and the team return to Oak Island follow up on last year's amazing discoveries, and double down on their efforts to locate the elusive Oak Island Money Pit.

2.title: Gold Rush

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Brothers Rick and Marty Lagina begin the biggest and most expensive operation ever undertaken in the 223 year long treasure hunt.

3.title: Depth Perception

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: The seismic results are in, revealing the existence of a mysterious underground chamber, while Gary and Jack make a discovery suggesting another Templar connection.

4.title: A Legacy Revealed

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Further investigation suggests Gary's latest find may be the oldest discovery on the island to date, and Rick is faced with a tragic loss.

5.title: Homecoming

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Seismic results guide the team to a possible network of tunnels in the Money Pit, while Gary unearths the first evidence of a French presence that could rewrite the history of the Oak Island mystery.

6.title: Precious Metal

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: New insights on Nolan Cross suggest a Templar connection to the Money Pit while emerging, hard evidence convinces the team the discovery of the lead cross may be the most historic find in North America.

7.title: Rock Solid

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: After years of searching, the team may have located a previously discovered artifact that has been missing for more than a century. In Smith's Cove, the Laginas struggle to hold back the waters.

8.title: Unearthed

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: After months of tireless effort, Rick, Marty and the team begin the massive excavation at Smith's Cove and almost immediately strike gold.

9.title: As Above, So Below

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: New evidence uncovered at Smith's Cove brings the fellowship closer to deciphering the purpose of the mysterious "u" shaped structure and a previously undiscovered formation may lead them to the island's elusive, legendary flood tunnels.

10.title: Fingers Made of Stone

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: A carved stone discovered at the money pit suggests an early Viking presence on Oak Island; the team may have finally discovered the elusive Oak Island box drains at Smith's Cove.

11.title: Wharfs and All

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: While the excavation of Smith's Cove continues to uncover an abundance of ancient structures, Rick, Marty and the team resume the treasure hunt in H8, convinced more than ever it is the site of the money pit.

12.title: Slipway When Wet

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: A shocking new discovery at Smith's Cove suggests that the origin of the Oak Island mystery may date much earlier and be more profound than the treasure hunters before ever suspected.

13.title: The Paper Chase

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: A stunning structure uncovered in Smith's Cove perplexes the brotherhood like never before and at the Money Pit, the team finds evidence they may have discovered the legendary box believed to contain the Oak Island treasure

1.title: What Lies Below

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Brothers Rick and Marty Lagina now own most of the mysterious Oak Island. Determined to resurrect the 200 year old search for treasure, they explore an abandoned shaft called 10-X.

2.title: The Mystery of Smith's Cove

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: When the team discovers something very unusual at Smith's Cove, Rick and Marty Lagina believe they've made a huge breakthrough in unlocking Oak Island's secrets.

3.title: Voices from the Grave

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: As Rick and Marty Lagina begin work to drain a mysterious swamp, they are visited by a woman who lost her father and brother to a tragic accident on Oak Island that gave rise to rumors of a deadly curse.

4.title: The Secret of Solomon's Temple

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: A visitor presents Rick and Marty with his incredible theory about where the treasure on the island is located.

5.title: The Find

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Rick and Marty Lagina make one of the biggest discoveries in the 200-year old search for treasure on Oak Island.

1.title: Once In, Forever In

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: After dating the Spanish coin they found last summer to 1652, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina return to Oak Island and the strange triangle-shaped swamp to look for more clues to this 200-year-old mystery.

2.title: Return to the Money Pit

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: As Rick and Marty Lagina begin excavating the infamous Money Pit, a visitor shows them evidence that the treasures from King Solomon's Temple could be buried on Oak Island.

3.title: The Eight-Pointed Star

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: After hearing that a treasure of biblical proportions was buried on Oak Island 2500 years ago, Rick and Marty Lagina look for evidence to prove it while also trying to locate the original Money Pit.

4.title: The Breakthrough

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Rick, Marty and the Oak Island team make a potentially historic discovery in the Money Pit.

5.title: The 90-Foot Stone

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Possible mysterious evidence comes to light that may lead the team closer to the treasure.

6.title: Seven Must Dye

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: While Rick conducts a test that may help the team locate man-made flood tunnels on the island, Marty heads to Europe to track down an incredible lead.

7.title: The Trail of the Templars

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: While work begins in the swamp, Rick and Marty travel to Scotland to investigate an incredible theory about the construction of the Money Pit.

8.title: X Marks the Spot

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Rick and Marty search the swamp for an alternate entrance into the Money Pit.

9.title: A Dangerous Dive

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

10.title: The Big Reveal

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: This last episode for their 2nd Season, Ended with the Team which primarily consists of the Lagina Brothers (Rick & Marty) alongside with Father & Son duo, Dan & Dave Blankenship as well as other important members of this group, Stand by as the 2 World Renowned Scuba Divers that they hired, Dan & Kathy Misiaszek a Husband & Wife team make their way down the Infamous 10X Shaft where the 2 divers try to make their way down to a depth of 181ft in an 8ft Wide Shaft that then turns into a 27" shaft between 182ft to the bottom of the shaft at 235ft & Problems ensue.

1.title: The Hole Truth

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: As Rick and Marty Lagina return to Oak Island, they discover that not only does borehole 10-X contain even more secrets than previously thought, but a new technology could prove that there are numerous treasure sites lying all over the island.

2.title: Pipe Down

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: After scanning sonar has corroborated Dan Blankenship's long held belief that a chamber 235 feet down 10-X may contain wooden posts, side tunnels, a chest and even human remains, Rick and Marty Lagina along with their partners begin clearing the shaft of obstructions to allow divers to safely explore it.

3.title: Time to Dig

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Rick and Marty Lagina bring heavy digging equipment to the island and their first target is where a researcher claims the treasures of the Knights Templar lie buried.

4.title: The Overton Stone

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: After finding the original Money Pit, Rick and Marty Lagina look at an ancient stone carving that may help prove that Portuguese explorers with connections to the Knights Templar are behind the Oak Island Mystery.

5.title: Disappearing Act

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: While prepping for a diver to explore the bottom of 10-X, Rick and Marty Lagina arrange to send an ROV camera down the shaft, which reveals evidence that could threaten their entire operation.

6.title: Carved in Stone

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Rick Lagina, Jack Begley and Dave Blankenship are looking for the missing H.O. stone a mysterious carved stone that was part of a larger boulder on the north shore that searchers blew up in the 1800's wrongly believing there might be treasure beneath it.

7.title: The Missing Peace

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: The brothers successfully negotiate bringing Fred Nolan back into the venture and everyone celebrates the history of the island by burying a Time Capsule.

8.title: Phantoms of the Deep

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: The brothers searching the surrounding waters for new clues and evidences. Could it be that they found the missing piece underwater?

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Rick, Marty and their partners obtain a mysterious sword that could connect the Roman Empire to the Oak Island treasure hunt.

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Evidence of pirates on Oak Island mounts after a treasure chest from the 1700s is found; Rick and Marty get stunning news about a find from the Money Pit.

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: New, hard evidence of a European presence on Oak Island more than a century before the discovery of the Money Pit exhilarates the team.

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: The team hits a possible void in the Money Pit. The discovery of an artifact brings emotional upheaval, and an accident happens at the drilling site.

5.title: Bone Dry

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: The discovery of an old document provides new clues on the exact location of the Money Pit; the fellowship of the dig makes a cryptic discovery at uncharted depths.

6.title: Remains of the Day

8.title: Dan's Breakthrough

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: New evidence confirms a European presence on Oak Island 100 years before the discovery of the Money Pit, while new research suggests a clear pathway from the Knights Templar to Oak Island.

9.title: The French Connection

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: A research expedition to a French castle and prison reveals new clues, including ancient carvings that strengthen a possible link between the Knights Templar and Oak Island.

10.title: The Signs of a Cross

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: The team unearths a ship's log detailing the burial of treasure on an island similar to Oak Island. Later, Rick and Gary make what may prove to be the biggest find on Oak Island.

11.title: Moving Targets

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Further investigation suggests a link between the mysterious medieval cross and the Knights Templar.

12.title: A Key to the Mystery

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: A Skeleton key and maps from Fred Nolan's archives open a new door in the Lagina's quest, while new evidence suggests a Templar connection to the lead cross found in Smith's Cove.

13.title: Unhinged

episode of.title: The Curse of Oak Island (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: The discovery of the mysterious lead cross raised new questions about a Knights Templar connection. In this special episode, we take a look at Templar history and the compelling Templar clues the team has found so far.

imdb.title: The Curse of Oak Island
plot: Rick and Marty Lagina, two brothers from Michigan with a life-long interest in the mystery of Oak Island, renew efforts to discover the legendary treasure with sophisticated machinery.
synopsis: Following a childhood dream, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina, embark on a quest to find treasure on Oak Island, off the south shore of Nova Scotia, Canada. With family, local explorers, and historical experts, they explore the island's landscape and mythology. Known for its sinkholes and caves, Oak Island lends itself to many mysteries, and is possibly linked to pirates, the Knights Templar, buried treasure, secret booby traps, and a curse of death. There is mystery here but what is it? For more than two centuries, people have explored the secrets of this island, but all have failed; some have died. This documentary series follows the Lagina brothers as they sift through the debris of land, sea, and legend to find the answer.
